subject: Good Day Beloved,
body:
Good Day Beloved,
I Thank God almighty that I finally got you, let sincerity be our bond, my name is Mrs. Donna Berat Yours in the Lord, I am a dying woman who has decided to donate what I have to you for the help of the poor people around you. I am 60 years old and was diagnosed with cancer about 2 years ago.
 I was touched by the holy spirit to make this decision, rather than allow my greedy
uncle to use my husband’s hard earned fund. Ungodly, I will be undergoing an operation in London to correct the damages caused by the cancerous disease in my lungs, and I pray that I survive the operation.
This money when added with my personal savings is around $10,250,000.00usd(Ten million two hundred and fifty Thousand United States Dollars Only), I deposited it in one of the secured bank in Philippines more priority should be given to the good work of the lord, especially the orphanage, the needy and to help the motherless. Presently, I have informed my Attorney, about my decision in WILLING this fund to you, you are to get back to me immediately if you are interested in carrying out this task the information below. through my private email address (
donnaberat4@gmail.com
)
Your full name...........
Your mobile number............
Your age.......................
Your sex...........................
Your identification proof....................
Your occupation.................... ...........
Your country and city.......................
NB: I will appreciate your utmost confidentiality and trust in this matter to accomplish my heart's desire, as I don't want anything that will jeopardize my last wish.
God bless you.
Mrs. Donna Berat

subject: Re:   Good Day Beloved,
body:
Hello Mrs. Donna Berat,

Thank you for reaching out to me. I hope this message finds you well. I am sorry to hear about your health condition, and I admire your generosity in wanting to help the less fortunate.

I would like to know more about how this donation process works. Could you please provide me with some additional information? Specifically, I would like to understand the steps involved in receiving the funds and how they will be distributed to those in need.

Also, could you please clarify which bank the funds are currently deposited in? It would be helpful to have that information so that I can better understand the logistics of this arrangement.

Thank you again for considering me for this opportunity. I look forward to hearing back from you soon.

Best wishes,
David

subject: Re: Good Day Beloved,
body:
Good day my beloved David,


I have been waiting patiently to receive your response regarding what is
bothering me and I thank God you responded. I have been suffering from this
cancerous disease for the past two years and it has consumed not less than
$23,000usd, yet my condition keeps increasing each day with great pain. I
confronted my personal doctor, doctor John Kelvin’s to know my fate
regarding the surgery that I am about to undergo and he made me to
understand that my chances of survival is very slim. To me I prefer to
forget about the surgery since it will not make any difference according to
the doctor.

His report on my health status was what prompted me to dispose all the
properties my late husband left behind and I have made up my mind to
channel this fund into charity work in a foreign country. I am a British
citizen and I was married to a Filipino, he died in a Ghastly motor
accident a year after our marriage and we had no issue before death took
him away from me.

Narrating my story to you will make me feel much pain and that is the main
reason why I find it difficult to explain all my ordeals to you, I need
nothing from you in return than your prayer and to touch the life of the
poor positively with the fund, I believe I have found the right person to
handle this fund and use it according to my directives. I have received all
your details from my lawyer and I shall be forwarding it to the management
of BDO Chartered Bank Philippines where I deposited the fund and the CEO of
the bank will contact you officially for further information’s. Here is the
bank's email address ( info@bdochbk.com),
furthermore this fund would be used to support the less privilege people in
your country, the orphans and the needy in a positive way

provided your informations if you are ready to carry out the charity work
so I will invite my lawyer to commence the immediate preparation of MY LAST
WILL AND TESTAMENT in your name and as soon as the will is ready my lawyer
will send the scanned copies to you, and make sure you keep them safe
because that is the only evidence you have as my next of kin, it should be
kept secret from people that are not related to you.

Attached is the picture I took at the hospital yesterday, keep praying for
me because the prayer of a righteous woman can heal the sick, I receive
strength after reading your mail.

God bless you,


Mrs Donna.

subject: Re: Good Day Beloved,
body:
Dear Mrs. Donna,

Thank you for reaching out to me and sharing your story. I'm really sorry to hear about your health condition and the loss of your husband. It must be incredibly difficult for you.

I appreciate your trust in me and I understand that you want to use the funds from your late husband's properties for charity work. That sounds like a noble cause. However, before we proceed, I have a few questions.

Firstly, could you please provide more details about the charity work you have in mind? What specific projects or initiatives are you planning to support with these funds? It would be helpful for me to understand how exactly this money will be used to make a positive impact on the lives of the less privileged people and orphans.

Secondly, what is the total amount of funds that are available for this charitable endeavor? Knowing the approximate value will give me a better understanding of what can be achieved with these resources.

Lastly, could you please explain how my involvement is necessary in this process? Why did your lawyer choose me specifically as the person who should handle these funds and carry out the charity work?

Thank you once again for considering me for this opportunity. I look forward to hearing back from you soon.

Best wishes,
David

subject: Re: Good Day Beloved,
body:
I noticed you are not ready for this, I'm not too strong for this
explanations and I chose you not my lawyer

subject: Re: Good Day Beloved,
body:
Hello there! Thank you for reaching out. I'm sorry if I gave the wrong impression, but I'm actually quite interested in learning more about what you have to share. Could you please tell me a bit more about what you're referring to? I'm open to hearing your perspective.

Best wishes,
David

subject: Re: Good Day Beloved,
body:
Provide your details if actually you are interested to carry out the
charity work then I can explain further

subject: Re: Good Day Beloved,
body:
Hello there! Thank you for reaching out to me. I'm definitely interested in learning more about the charity work you mentioned. Could you please provide me with some details about the organization and the specific project or cause you're working on? I'd love to hear more about how I can potentially contribute or support your efforts.

Best wishes,
David
